name: Blastoise
evolution: Level 1 Squirtle, Level 5 Wartortle, Level 9 Blastoise

passive.name: Torrent
passive.description: When the Pokemon is at half HP or less, its Attack and Sp. Atk are increased.

base.name: Water Gun
base.description: Attacks with a shot of water, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time. Also {{shoves|knockback}} opposing Pokemon and leaves then {{unable to act|stun}} after they are shoved the maximum distance.

upgrades.name: Hydro Pump
upgrades.description: Shoots a fierce stream of water which knocks back opponents hit. Enemy Pokemon who are knocked back the furthest are stunned for a while.

upgrades.name: Water Spout
upgrades.description: Spouts water toward the designated location, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokemon in the area of effect for a short time.

base.name: Skull Bash
base.description: Fiercely rams an opposing Pokemon and leaves it {{unable to act|stun}}.

upgrade.description: Grants a shield when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description: Has the user charge forward on a wave, {{shoving|knockback}} opposing Pokemon and leaving them unable to act.

upgrade.description: Increase movement speed and reduce damage taken.

upgrades.name: Rapid Spin
upgrades.description: Retracts into its shell and spins while strengthening basic attacks and spraying moves.

unite.name: Hydro Typhoon
unite.description: Spouts water to attack while spinning and {{throws|knock up}} opposing Pokemon in a large area. The user is shielded while using this move.
